name: Global Summit on Immunology-2017
content: Immunology Conference is to gathering people in academia and society interested in immunology to share the latest trends and important issues relevant to our field/subject area. Immunology Conference brings together the global leaders in Immunology and relevant fields to present their research at this exclusive scientific program. The Immunology events host presentations from editors of prominent refereed journals, renowned and active investigators and decision makers in the field of Immunology. Immunology Organising Committee also invites Young investigators at every career stage to submit abstracts reporting their latest scientific findings in oral and poster sessions. The conference will include invited speakers, oral presentations, poster session and the young scientist award.
